column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Korra says : " Why did you bring me to the swamp ?
#Text=" Korra says : " I get your point .
#Text=But why did you bring me here ?
#Text=What am I gon na find in the swamp ?
#Text=" Light spirit says : " Not a what , a who .
#Text=" Korra says : " No , wait !
#Text=Come back !
#Text=" Korra says : " You 're just in my mind .
#Text=You 're not real .
#Text=" Korra says : " Help !
#Text=" Unknown woman says : " Feeling better ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Where am I ?
#Text=Wha - what happened ?
#Text=" Unknown woman says : " I was hoping you could tell me .
#Text=I found you passed out in the mud .
#Text=" Korra says : " How 'd you know I was out there ?
#Text=" Unknown woman says : " I 'm pretty tapped into the goings - on around here .
#Text=What brings you to the swamp , anyway ?
#Text=" Korra says : " A spirit led me here and told me I was supposed to find someone .
#Text=Is that you ?
#Text=" Unknown woman says : " Beats me .
#Text=But if your Avatar senses called you here , you should probably listen to them .
#Text=" Korra says : " Wait , you recognize me ?
#Text=" Unknown woman says : " In a manner of speaking .
#Text=We were good friends in your previous life .
#Text=" Korra says : " I ca n't believe it ... Toph ?
#Text=" Toph says : " Nice to see you again , Twinkle Toes .
#Text="
